workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - DB Admin with Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup Compute Instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Connect to SQL Plus and View Container Details
tutorials.description: How to log in to SQL Plus and explore the Container Database (CDB) and Pluggable Database (PDB) with basic SQL commands.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Log in to Oracle EMCC
tutorials.description: How to log in to Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC) and access the home page.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Manage Targets - Oracle Database and Listener
tutorials.description: How to manage the targets discovered by Oracle EMCC. View details of Oracle Database and listener and administer them from Oracle EMCC as managed targets.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Access Container Home Page
tutorials.description: How to access the container home page from Oracle EMCC. Learn how to switch between containers and manage your favorites.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
